name: R-Type exercice
description:
Made as an exercise in JavaScript course, this is my fist JavaScript game. Most of the assets are made by me, but some are taken from existing games (graphic assets from Medroid, soundtracks from pokemon).

The first time you play the game, the screen will stay black for some time. It's normal ! Your computer is downloading the necessary files. Once it's done, the game will launch a lot faster.

If the game stops responding (menu buttons), press F5 to refresh the page, then clic directly on the game, and it should be fixed.
